Glance


A World's Fashion Consultant

Did you ever want to discover a new look? Have you run into situations where you simply can't decide what to wear? No problem, we've got a solution for you. Glance is an Android app that helps you choose an outfit.

Here is how Glance will be built: We will use the Android framework, integrating front-end UI, Firebase backend, and the Android Machine Learning (ML) module

Check out our VC pitch slide deck

Find Out More!

How you "Glance"

Snap two photos of outfits you're deciding between

Express your needs in words (e.g. votes from ladies, gents, or anyone?)

Post your glance and get votes on the better outfit within minutes

Every time you vote on 10 outfit from other users, you can post one of your own
